title: What Strategist Readers are Buying: Heel Sleeves and Baby Books
text:
8. Wamsutta Extra-Firm Side-Sleeper Pillow (Off last list)

Although it was off the list for a few weeks, this pillow has appeared on our list 18 times — the second most of any product. We discovered it when we tested out a wide selection of pillows designed for side sleepers, and concluded that the Wamsutta Extra-Firm was the most comfortable and supportive of them all: “Unlike other pillows that mistake plushness or fluffiness for support, the WEF didn’t sink as soon as I rested my head. Instead, it had a firm, satisfying spring — it’s a different sensation, but one I took to right away. And even though I didn’t do any measuring, my head felt more propped up from the mattress and sheets than with any other pillow.”
description: Strategist readers are buying Oral-B electric toothbrushes, Anker lightning cables, Purito sunscreen, Cosrx snail essence, NatraCure gel heel sleeves, Boon bath toys, Press Here board books, Uberlube lubricant, Wamsutta pillows, and more.
